results:
I found the search results for "Chłopi" by Władysław Stanisław Reymont on the lubimyczytac.pl website. Here's what I found regarding the ratings:

The search results show several different editions and versions of "Chłopi" with their respective ratings on lubimyczytac.pl:

**Main editions and their ratings:**

The main "Chłopi" book has a rating of 7.6 on lubimyczytac.pl.

Chłopi, Tom 1 has a rating of 8.3, while there are also other volumes mentioned with various ratings:

- Tom 2 appears to have a rating of 6.7
- Tom 3 (Wiosna) has a rating of 7.6

**Additional context:**
The book has received 7,415 total ratings and 275 opinions on the platform, with a detailed breakdown showing ratings distributed across the 1-10 scale.

This is the Nobel Prize-winning work for which Władysław Stanisław Reymont received the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1924. The Nobel Prize was awarded with the justification: "Za wybitny epos narodowy, Chłopów" (For his outstanding national epic, The Peasants).

The ratings vary depending on the specific edition, with individual volumes generally receiving higher ratings than the complete work, suggesting readers may have different preferences for different parts of this four-volume epic about Polish peasant life.
